document_data.name: Trader
document_data.mainbody: '''Traders''' were [[Azuposi]] [[rogue]]s who earned a living traveling and trading wares with other communities.<ref name="CoG-pA4-A5" >
document_data.Activities: They spent their time traveling between the many different settlements of the Azuposi.
document_data.Culture: Traders were wealthy by Azuposi standards. This earned them both a degree of respect and a fair share of envious glares.
document_data.Abilities: They were skilled bargainers and generally got along well with others.
document_data.Possessions: Traders dressed like most Azuposi, save for random accessories they accumulated during their far travels. A trader would usually dress appropriately for each village they visited, proving to the natives that they had been there before. They wielded [[club]]s, [[sling]]s, [[dagger]]s, or [[short bow]]s.
